dataTemplate.name: BCO_TRAN_IDS_BY_PURCH_ORD_NO
dataTemplate.description: BCO Tran IDs by Purchase Order Number

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT oref1.ob_refnum_value loc, s.shipment_xid shipment_id, oob.order_base_xid contract_no, sref1.refnum_value tran_id, sref2.refnum_value tran_id_date, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3), '999,999,990.000')) tran_id_weight, 'MT' weight_uom FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN ob_refnum oref ON oob.order_base_gid = oref.order_base_gid AND oref.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PURCHASE ORDER PLANNED TO INVENTORY' AND oref.ob_refnum_value = 'Y' INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_base vsob ON oob.order_base_gid = vsob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsob.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum sref1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sref1.s_ship_unit_gid AND sref1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.TRAN ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum sref2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sref2.s_ship_unit_gid AND sref2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOAD DATE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE oob.order_base_gid = :ORDER_BASE_ID UNION SELECT oref1.ob_refnum_value loc, s.shipment_xid shipment_id, oob.order_base_xid contract_no, ssu.tag_3 tran_id, ssu.tag_2 tran_id_date, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND( (SELECT orel.total_weight_base FROM order_release orel WHERE orel.order_release_xid = (SELECT ssuref.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref WHERE ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid= 'SCOULAR.RELATED PURCHASE ORDER RELEASE NUMBER' AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid)) / 2204.5855379,3), '999,999,990.000')) tran_id_weight, 'MT' weight_uom FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_base vsob ON oob.order_base_gid = vsob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsob.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE oob.order_base_gid = :ORDER_BASE_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT or1.order_base_gid FROM ob_refnum or1 WHERE or1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PURCHASE ORDER PLANNED TO INVENTORY' AND or1.ob_refnum_value = 'Y' AND or1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) AND EXISTS (SELECT sr1.s_ship_unit_gid FROM s_ship_unit_refnum sr1 WHERE sr1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND sr1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.MATCHED_PO_ID') AND EXISTS (SELECT sr1.s_ship_unit_gid FROM s_ship_unit_refnum sr1 WHERE sr1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND sr1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.MATCHED_PO_ID_2') UNION SELECT oref1.ob_refnum_value loc, s.shipment_xid shipment_id, oob.order_base_xid contract_no, ssu.tag_3 tran_id, ssu.tag_2 tran_id_date, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND( (SELECT orel.total_weight_base FROM order_release orel WHERE orel.order_release_xid = (SELECT ssuref.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref WHERE ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid= 'SCOULAR.RELATED PURCHASE ORDER RELEASE NUMBER_2' AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid)) / 2204.5855379,3), '999,999,990.000')) tran_id_weight, 'MT' weight_uom FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_base vsob ON oob.order_base_gid = vsob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsob.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE oob.order_base_gid = :ORDER_BASE_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT or1.order_base_gid FROM ob_refnum or1 WHERE or1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PURCHASE ORDER PLANNED TO INVENTORY' AND or1.ob_refnum_value = 'Y' AND or1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) AND EXISTS (SELECT sr1.s_ship_unit_gid FROM s_ship_unit_refnum sr1 WHERE sr1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND sr1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.MATCHED_PO_ID') AND EXISTS (SELECT sr1.s_ship_unit_gid FROM s_ship_unit_refnum sr1 WHERE sr1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND sr1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.MATCHED_PO_ID_2') UNION SELECT oref1.ob_refnum_value loc, s.shipment_xid shipment_id, oob.order_base_xid contract_no, ssu.tag_3 tran_id, ssu.tag_2 tran_id_date, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3), '999,999,990.000')) tran_id_weight, 'MT' weight_uom FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_base vsob ON oob.order_base_gid = vsob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsob.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE oob.order_base_gid = :ORDER_BASE_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT or1.order_base_gid FROM ob_refnum or1 WHERE or1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PURCHASE ORDER PLANNED TO INVENTORY' AND or1.ob_refnum_value = 'Y' AND or1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) AND EXISTS (SELECT sr1.s_ship_unit_gid FROM s_ship_unit_refnum sr1 WHERE sr1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND sr1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.MATCHED_PO_ID') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT sr1.s_ship_unit_gid FROM s_ship_unit_refnum sr1 WHERE sr1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND sr1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.MATCHED_PO_ID_2')) a ORDER BY TO_DATE(a.tran_id_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') DESC
